stories.Title: SREday
stories.Description: Circle the dates: September 14th-15th for SREday in London! An in-depth exploration of Site Reliability Engineering with over 50+ talks led by top experts. Reserve your early bird tickets today!
stories.Tweet: SREday 📦 Circle the dates: September 14th-15th for SREday in London! An in-depth exploration of Site Reliability Engineering with over 50+ talks led by top experts. Reserve your early bird tickets today! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: OpenAI's latest move
stories.Description: Global Illumination has left its creative mark on notable companies. Now, OpenAI announces its acquisition, hinting at a potential collaboration that could elevate core products like ChatGPT.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI's latest move 📦 Global Illumination has left its creative mark on notable companies. Now, OpenAI announces its acquisition, hinting at a potential collaboration that could elevate core products like ChatGPT. #openai https://www.theverge.com/2023/8/16/23834645/openai-global-illumination-acquisition-minecraft-clone-chatgpt

stories.Title: Choose the best model
stories.Description: Arthur has unveiled Arthur Bench. This open-source tool measures the effectiveness of different LLMs against a specific set of data, allowing you to find the right match for your requirements.
stories.Tweet: Choose the best model 📦 Arthur has unveiled Arthur Bench. This open-source tool measures the effectiveness of different LLMs against a specific set of data, allowing you to find the right match for your requirements. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/08/17/arthur-releases-open-source-tool-to-help-companies-find-the-best-llm-for-a-job/

stories.Title: AI in the newsroom
stories.Description: The Associated Press has released guidelines that embrace AI's potential while maintaining journalistic integrity. This includes the prohibition of AI-generated content from being published.
stories.Tweet: AI in the newsroom 📦 The Associated Press has released guidelines that embrace AI's potential while maintaining journalistic integrity. This includes the prohibition of AI-generated content from being published. #ai https://apnews.com/article/artificial-intelligence-guidelines-ap-news-532b417395df6a9e2aed57fd63ad416a

stories.Title: Mckinsey introduces Lilli
stories.Description: The company wants to demonstrate the potential of AI in consultancy. Based on more than 100,000 internal documents, this tool has already reduced research and planning times drastically.
stories.Tweet: Mckinsey introduces Lilli 📦 The company wants to demonstrate the potential of AI in consultancy. Based on more than 100,000 internal documents, this tool has already reduced research and planning times drastically. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/consulting-giant-mckinsey-unveils-its-own-generative-ai-tool-for-employees-lilli/

stories.Title: Spooky or glitchy?
stories.Description: A video snippet uploaded by a glitch on Snapchat's "My AI" chatbot gave users a sci-fi movie experience, as if technology had gained its own consciousness.
stories.Tweet: Spooky or glitchy?  📦 A video snippet uploaded by a glitch on Snapchat's "My AI" chatbot gave users a sci-fi movie experience, as if technology had gained its own consciousness. #snapchat https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/08/snapchats-ai-chatbot-posts-mysterious-video-and-goes-silent-spooking-users/

stories.Title: iOS welcomes Opera's AI assistant
stories.Description: Aria AI has become available on iOS within the Opera app. With a million users already on desktop and Android, get ready to upgrade your browsing experience.
stories.Tweet: iOS welcomes Opera's AI assistant 📦 Aria AI has become available on iOS within the Opera app. With a million users already on desktop and Android, get ready to upgrade your browsing experience. #opera https://www.engadget.com/operas-ai-browser-assistant-is-now-available-in-its-ios-app-181021204.html

stories.Title: The future of visuals
stories.Description: MIT engineers are making progress in integrating quantum rods into LED displays and virtual reality systems, through the use of DNA scaffolds, aiming for more vibrant and immersive visuals.
stories.Tweet: The future of visuals 📦 MIT engineers are making progress in integrating quantum rods into LED displays and virtual reality systems, through the use of DNA scaffolds, aiming for more vibrant and immersive visuals. #science https://www.techtimes.com/articles/295167/20230816/mit-engineers-develop-dna-assembled-quantum-rods-enhance-tvs-vr.htm

stories.Title: One step closer to saving lives
stories.Description: A genetically modified pig kidney, successfully transplanted into a brain-dead man, has functioned normally for over a month. An achievement that brings hope to organ transplant patients.
stories.Tweet: One step closer to saving lives 📦 A genetically modified pig kidney, successfully transplanted into a brain-dead man, has functioned normally for over a month. An achievement that brings hope to organ transplant patients. #science https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2023/aug/16/pig-kidney-human-transplant

stories.Title: Off to the ISS!
stories.Description: NASA and SpaceX's Crew-7 mission is scheduled to fly on August 25. Four astronauts are headed to the ISS and you can witness every moment through a live stream.
stories.Tweet: Off to the ISS! 📦 NASA and SpaceX's Crew-7 mission is scheduled to fly on August 25. Four astronauts are headed to the ISS and you can witness every moment through a live stream. #NASA https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/how-to-watch-nasa-and-spacex-launch-crew-7-to-the-iss/

stories.Title: Back to the moon
stories.Description: Russia reaches lunar orbit for the first time since 1976 with the Luna-25 spacecraft. With communication stable and systems functioning, all eyes turn to the current lunar race.
stories.Tweet: Back to the moon 📦 Russia reaches lunar orbit for the first time since 1976 with the Luna-25 spacecraft. With communication stable and systems functioning, all eyes turn to the current lunar race. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/russias-luna-25-enters-moon-orbit-gears-for-soft-landing

title: AP issues AI guidelines, OpenAI acquires Global Illumination, Russia reaches lunar orbit
description: It's just another regular Thursday with AI stealing the spotlight: The Associated Press embraces AI integration; however, it sets clear boundaries between employees and AI-generated content. OpenAI takes a creative approach to its products through the acquisition of Global Illumination. And, for those not focusing on AI but on the lunar race: Russia has finally reached lunar orbit.
